paragraphs.transcript:
Hi, I'm Jacques Pepin and I'm cooking at home. Sometimes when I'm stuck for lunch, even dinner sometimes, we do those type of pizza. I love those tortilla. Sometimes I buy the corn tortilla, this is the flour tortilla, about 7 inch wide. And those are great.

I do sandwich with it. I do all kinds of things. Then we're going to do a pizza. So the first thing we do, put a little bit of oil, like maybe 2 teaspoon. No thick paper.

See, the shiny part is not the 1, it's the dull part that you want. Rub that into your oil a little bit, Turn it upside down again. Okay. So it depends what I have in my refrigerator, you know, but usually tomato will be there. So a couple of, I like to cut it pretty thin.

Slice of tomato. Cover more or less, yeah. My, this, this. I have a bit of mild onion here. So maybe we...

But make sure that if you do that, you cut it quite thin because it's not going to cook very long, you know? So a bit of onion. Yeah. On top of this, always salt. We have salt in there.

You know, tomato need salt. Pepper, freshly ground pepper is always the best. Here I happen to have basil, so I am going to put, of course, a couple of pieces of basil on top. I may even put some when it comes out of the oven, be more fragrant. So it's a little bit like a classic pizza, basil and 2.

And cheese on top of this. And I would say that I would put here, well, a third of a cup, a good third of a cup of cheese, which can be mozzarella, of course, or Gruyere, which I love too. This happens to be Monterey cheese, you know, so that's good, you know. Cheddar cheese is very good. That there is all kind of a, but, and then you can put Parmesan cheese on top if you want as well.

I'll put a dash of a, a dash of oil on top. And here it is. About 12, 15 minutes, 400 degree oven. Here we are, a beautiful pizza, you can see here, maybe for a little more of that, I may put a bit of a julienne fresh basil on top just because it's around. If it's around, I use it.

Great lunch. Here we are. The Assam pizza, tortilla pizza for your lunch. Bon appetit and happy cooking. And happy cooking.

And happy cooking. And happy cooking. You

I do all kinds of things.
